page.title: 07HUNDLETON VILLAGE,PEMBROKE.
page.content: { {Hundleton}is a quiet village except when the lorrys from the{Pembroke Oil {Refinery}go through. There are very few houses but there are other things besides houses such as a chapel, telephone kiosk,bus bay, restaurant, public house and places that do bed and breakfast. There is a park, playing area and football and cricket area.These are mostly for the use of the people living there. There is a shop, garage, post office, petrol station, coachworks and a mother and toddler group. The farmland which surrounds the village is mostly enclosed rough grazing land but there is intensively managed grassland and ploughed fields.
